title: How can I open my Mystery Gift from Riot?
body: it says that riot games has given me a mystery gift, but i do not kno how to open it. Could someone plz help me?

replies.body:
Firstly, you must meet the requirements to be given the mystery gift. Secondly, they are still in the process of handing them out.

The moment you receive the gift, unless you are in game, you will get a message saying what you got and it will immediately added to your inventory.

Hope that helps.

Agreed
Go to:
 -> Store
 -> -> Skins
Scroll down and find your skin - I got Warmonger {{champion:14}}

i got mystery gift from riot. clicked on it and it said awesome and went away without telling me what i got? I could not find what skin cuz i went through all my skins and found nothing.. cant be an icon either. someone.. pls helpppppppp?
But i scrol and it didin't show me anything
Hello from the future, I got Woad King Darius! Thank for the help :)
lol same here!  same skin , same message from the future !
Ugh, its the same thing for me...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I logged in to find that I had received a mystery reward from riot but when I clicked "awesome" it disappeared and didn't tell me what I got.
same im confused about it
you probably got the 10 year anniversary summoner icon and the riot kayle skin. i was confused too haha
They said that it might take a while to get all the gifts out so you hold on tight
When I logged in, it said I had received the mystery gift, I clicked the "Awesome!" button, it displayed the opening animation, and then nothing. How do I find out what I received?
"Purchases" and "Gifting History" are both empty.
it says u have earned a mysteries gift from riot wtf is this and how do i get it plzz help <3 {{summoner:4}}
i already had the riot kayle skin but it only gave me the icon wtf?
Guys if this was recently and riot already gave you the Riot Kayle skin I don't think the mystery gift was for a skin but for the 10 year icon.

I got the same problem ;(
{{champion:122}}

Said i received mystery Gift as well, i dont own alot of champs/skins so its easy for me to check to see what i got new, nothing is new, just got the icon, is there anything else that could be the gift minus new champ/skin? (Already Owned riot Kayle)

I opened my gift from riot today. Pressed awesome. Nothing happened. Problem is i have like 200 skins and its quite hard for me to check which skin I received as Mystery Gift. I got the summoner icon though. Purchases is empty for me too except for the icon.

i saw the gift pop up and and just pressed the thing and nothing came out
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Yessssss
i got one today and nothing happened
Go to all skins and check what u own ... then you will find what riot gave you :)
i recieved a gift but it didnt say i got something from it
Yep, same here. I just received a mystery gift, and have no idea what it was =S YAY! ;)
It told me that I got the gift but it didn't open. Does this mean the gift gave me nothing or that I didn't open it before closing the dialogue and now it's lost?

Well... That also happened to me so I had to go through all my owned champions, go through all the skins until I found the owned skin I got from a gift.. I ended up getting Fnatic Karthus which wasn't too bad :P

1. go to store
2. go to your account
3. purchase history
and you will see the present
